name: Chinese Game: Word Game, Vocabulary Game

Then download the Chinese word game right now!  Unlike most games to learn Chinese, with the Chinese word games you will never be boring. You can always keep playing and you will automatically learn and discover the meaning of the words you dont recognize on your first attempt.  Features   Chinese word game Includes thousands of Chinese words across 50+ levels   Chinese word game has unique game mechanics that will make you want to keep playing   Chinese word game is super easy to use for all ages   Play game to learn Chinese With Chinese vocabulary game, you need unlock new levels and track your progress   Chinese vocabulary game will fully customizable - setup your own levels for family and friends (comming soon)   Chinese vocabulary game optimized for all devices - can play game to learn Chinese offline   Chinese vocabulary game include many the words were selected carefully.   The vocabulary in the Chinese vocabulary game is Standard voice readers   Is the best game to learn Chinese, please download this app and play game to learn Chinese.  Any comments on the application of this Chinese Learning Game please send to admin. Thank you
